Choose a card to set its cost to 0 this turn.
Whenever you slay a non-minion enemy, lose #b3 #ySanity. Whenever you #yrest at Restsites, gain #b40 #ySanity and choose to obtain 1 #yPrayer card.
NL NL While #ySanity is full, gain #b10 Max HP at the start of each combat. Else, gain #b1 Max HP instead if #ySanity is above #b50.
NL NL While #ySanity is below #b50, gain #b3 #yVulnerable at the start of combat. NL Whenever you slay a non-minion enemy, lose #b1 Max HP.
NL NL While #ySanity is below #b30, gain #b3 #yWeak at the start of combat. NL Whenever you slay a non-minion enemy, lose #b4 more Max HP. Whenever you gain #ySinful, gain #b1 more.
